Translations.Text: Se'i arasyambharai ghatana, (kiyamata)
ki se'i arasyambharai ghatana
arau kihe tomaka janaba se'i arasyambharai ghatanatono ki
chamuda arau ada sampradaye mithyaraopa karaichila bhitiprada mahabipadaka
Seye chamuda sampradayaka dhbansa karaa haichila eta pralayankara biparyayakarai pracanda sabdara dbaraa
Arau ada sampradayaka dhbansa karaa haichila thanda prabala dhumuha batahara dbaraa

iyaka te'om sata raati arau atha dina abiraamabharae sihamtara oparata prabahita karaichila; phalata tumi ukta sampradayaka dekhibalai palahemtena---ye sihamta enekai sicaraita hai parai ache yene sarasun'ya khejura gachara kandahe
Iyara pichata sihamtara babe tumi kiba arasista dekhibalai poraane
arau phira'a'una, tara purbarartisakale lagate olota'i diya janapadabasiye jaghan'ya papa kamata lipta achila
Arau sihamte nija pratipalakara raachulaka aman'ya karaichila, phalata te'om sihamtaka atyanta kathorabharae graeptara karaile
Yetiya banapani bipadasima ceraa'i gaichila niscaya tetiya ami tomalokaka naramta araohana karaa'ichilo
Ami e'ito karaichilo tomalokaka eta smaraniya siksa diyara babe arau e'i babe ye, yate srautidhara kane iyaka samraksana karai raakhe
Eteke yetiya sinata phu diya ha’ba—kerala eta phu
Arau prthiraisaha parbatasamuhaka utha'i niya ha’ba arau matra eta aghatata e'ibora curna-bicurna hai yaba
Phalata se'idina mahaghatana sanghatita ha’ba
Arau akasa bidirna hai yaba, phalata se'idina i durbala-biksipta hai paraiba
Arau phiraistasakala akasara bibhinna praantata thakiba. Se'idina athajana phiraista'i tomara pratipalakara arachaka bahana karaiba
Se'idina tomalokaka upasthita karaoraa ha’ba lagate tomalokara kono gopaniyata'i arau gopana nathakiba
Tetiya yara amalanama tara som hatata diya ha’ba si ka’ba, ‘loraa, mora amalanama parhi coraa’
‘Mora drrha bisbasa achila ye, ma'i mora hicapara sanmukhina hama’
Seye te'om santosajanaka jirana-yapana karaiba
Su'ucca jannatata
yara phala-mula nice'i ocarata olami thakiba
(Koraa ha’ba) ‘bigata dinasamuhata tomaloke agalai yi praerana karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’
Kintu yara amalanama ba'om hatata diya ha’ba si ka’ba, ‘haya, moka yadi mora amalanama nidilehemtena’
‘arau yadi ma'i najanilohemtena mora hicapa
‘haya, mora mrtyurae'i yadi mora curanta phayacala ha’lehemtena
‘mora dhana-sampada mora kono kamata nahila
‘Mora ksamata sakti'o binasta haiche’
(Phiraistasakalaka koraa ha’ba) ‘dharaa taka arau galata pagha laga'i diya’
‘Tara pichata taka jahannamata niksepa karaa’
Tara pichata taka bandhi thoraa ene edala sikalirae yara dairgha sattara hata
Niscaya si mahana allahara prati imana posana karaa nachila
arau michakinaka khadyadanata utsahita karaa'o nachila
Eteke aji iyata tara kono antaranga bandhu nathakiba
Arau ksata-nihsrta pumjara bahirae ana kono khadya nathakiba
yito aparaadhisakalara bahirae ana kone'o nakhaba
Eteke ma'i sapata karao se'ibora bastura yibora tomaloke dekha poraa
arau tarao sapata karao yibora tomaloke dekha noporaa
niscaya eya (kora'ana) eka sanmanita raachulara (bahita) bani
Arau eya kono kabira katha nahaya; tomaloke khube'i kama imana posana karaa
Arau eya kono ganakara katha'o nahaya; tomaloke khube'i kama upadesa grahana karaa
Eya bisbajagatara pratipalakara taraphara paraa nayilakrta
Yadi te'om amara namata kono micha racana karailehemtena
tente niscaya ami taka som haterae dharailohemtena
tara pichata ami tara hrdapindara siraa kati dilohemtena
eteke tomalokara majata ene kono na'i, yiye taka raksa karaiba
Arau eya (kora'ana) to muttakbisakalara babe niscita eta upadesa
Arau ami niscaya jano ye, tomalokara majata kichumana mithyaraopakarai ache
Arau e'ito (kora'ana) niscaya kaphirasakalara babe eka niscita anusocanara karana
Arau niscaya e'ito suniscita satya
Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namata tachabiha patha karaa
Byakti ejane abedana karaile, ene sasti samparke yito apatita ha’ba
kaphirasakalara oparata, yara kono pratiraodhakarai na'i
E'ito ahiba allahara taraphara paraa, yijana urdhbaraohanara khatakhatiborara (jakhala) adhikarai
phiraistasakala arau rauha ene eta dinata allahara dise urd'dhagami haya, yara paraimana pancasa hajara bachara
Eteke tumi dhairya dharana karaa parama dhairya
Sihamte e'i dinaka bahu durata thaka buli bharae
Arau ami iyaka nice'i ocarata dekhi acho
Se'idina akasa hai yaba galita dhatura darae
arau parbatasamuha hai yaba rana-biranara unara darae
arau kono antaranga bandhurae antaranga bandhura kha-khabara nusudhiba
sihamtaka ijane-sijanara drstigocara karaoraa ha’ba. Aparaadhiye se'idinara sastira binimayata diba bicaraiba tara santana-santatika
arau tara strai arau bhatrka
arau tara jati-gosthika, yisakale taka asraya dichila
arau prthiraita yisakala ache se'i sakaloke, yate e'i binimaye taka mukti diye
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'ito lelihana ju'i
yiye murara chala khaha'i pelaba
Jahanname se'i byaktika matiba, yiye satyara prati prstha pradarsana karaichila arau mukha ghuraa'i laichila
Arau sampada sancaya karaichila arau se'ibora samraksana karai raakhichila
